package.name: Update_Product
package.summary: Extension is use for those product who depend on their base price ,shipping cost and currency you can change all product price by admin based on currency of product
package.description:
you can use this extension to use this plugin for update product price for this plugin i have create 3 custom attribute for each product 1)basis_preis(base_price) 2)versandkosten (shipping cost) 3)currency(name:-pfund,euro,usd) you can use above extension after creating this 3 attribute this plugin is only for those product which price is based on their base price and shipping cost and as well as based on currency
for more details see screenshot or also visit: http://abhaykhatariya.blogspot.com/ also you can contact me for more details.
